overview.description: St. Francis de Sales College provides robust Wi-Fi infrastructure as part of its commitment to integrating ICT at all levels. This initiative supports enhanced access to education and development of IT skill sets across the institution.
overview.policy: The management policy supports the integration and enhancement of IT across all operational areas of the college.

infrastructure.internet_speed: More than 2 Mbps data transfer rate
infrastructure.bandwidth: 200 Mbps Internet Bandwidth for campus-wide connectivity
infrastructure.deployment: Optimal deployment of IT infrastructure through workshops, awareness and training programs for faculty
infrastructure.classroom_facilities: Classrooms are equipped with technologically advanced audio-visual aids for innovative and interactive teaching.

features: Digitally advanced library with daily student access
Teaching through OHP screens in computer centres
Student internet access, project preparation, and practice opportunities

labs.equipment: Labs equipped with latest software and hardware

erp.impact: ERP platform enhances equity, excellence, and expansion among diverse student communities

maintenance.amc: Annual Maintenance Contracts renewed at the beginning of each academic year for software, UPS, and generators
maintenance.investment: Institution invests in essential hardware and software to ensure continuous IT infrastructure support
